resources.string: This game is a blackjack variant that provides the player with power-ups to balance the implicit edge of the dealer. A list and explanation of each power-up can be found in the "How to Play" section. I hope you have fun playing the game!

All images in this app are used either with explicit permission or a Creative Commons license.

 Title screen joker: drawsgood, itch.io
 https://drawsgood.itch.io/8bit-deck-card-assets (explicit permission)

 Playing cards: George Blackwell, itch.io
 https://georgeblackwell.itch.io/playing-cards-sprite-pack\ (Creative Commons)

 Poker chips: mehrasaur, OpenGameArt
 https://opengameart.org/content/playing-card-assets-52-cards-deck-chips (Creative Commons)
